categories: Category:Imperial I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Annihilator, was stationed on the borders of Hutt Space, near the Periphery, with the Ruthless around 4 ABY. Governor Newen Streeg of the Periphery had the option of calling on the Annihilator when necessary.
There are two Imperial warships called Annihilator at roughly the same time. The second was an Executor-class Star Dreadnought.
